channel.title: error on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform
channel.description: Recent content in error on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform

item.title: AX 2012 R3 CU8 CU9 and TFS Online 2013 Error
item.description: When you try connecting between TFS and Dynamics AX CU8, CU9 and you got error like this: Error 1 Team Foundation services are not available from server ****.visualstudio.com/defaultcollection. Technical information (for administrator): TF400813: Resource not available for anonymous access. Client authentication required. Error 2 Could not load file or assembly ‘Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Client, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a’ or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified. Client computers that are not running Visual Studio 2010 must have the Team Foundation Server 2010 SP1 Object Model installed to use TFS source control with Microsoft Dynamics AX.
